channel.title: Woocommerce on Damien Saunders
channel.description: Recent content in Woocommerce on Damien Saunders

item.title: 8 points to help you choose the right WordPress e-Commerce solution
item.description: WordPress is a very versatile solution for e-commerce. There are many ways you can integrate or setup e-commerce with WordPress allowing you to sell goods and services at the same time as blogging or promoting them. Most of the available options are just plugins, a quick scan of the WordPress plugin repo will show there are plenty of options from donation buttons for PayPal to integrations with Magento. What WordPress E-Commerce Solutions are there?
